name: MUGEN FIGHTERS HYPER
description:
Play the easiest controls for fighting games and play like a pro!!!

My 2nd Mugen Game called MUGEN FIGHTERS HYPER is open for Early Access.

Please try it out, to hear your feedback and to improve it even better.

Also please tell me if theres some glitches, bugs and nonstop combos so I can fix them.

The controls are mostly the same as MUGEN FIGHTERS ULTIMATE.

==MUGEN FIGHTERS HYPER==

PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO SUBSCRIBE TO MY YOUTUBE: MUGEN FIGHTERS ULTIMATE FOR

NOT MISSING UP CHARACTERS THAT WILL BE ADDED TO THE ROSTER.

==CONTROLS==

THIS CONTROLS CAN MAKE A COMBO SO BETTER TRAIN FIRST BEFORE PLAYING

PRESS "X" FAST  -------------------  THIS CAN MAKE A PUNCH COMBO.

PRESS "Y" FAST  -------------------  THIS CAN MAKE A KICK COMBO.

==HYPER CONTROLS==

FWD "X" + "Y"

FWD "Y" + "Z" 

FWD "A" + "B"

FWD "B" + "C" 

FWD "X" + "Y" 

BACK "X" + "Y" 

BACK "Y" + "Z"

BACK "A" + "B" 

BACK "B" + "C" 

"X" + "Y" 

"Y" + "Z" 

"A" + "B"

"B" + "C" 

"X" + "Y" 

==SPECIAL CONTROLS==

FWD "A"

FWD "Z"

FWD "B"

FWD "C"

BACK "A"

BACK "Z"

BACK "B"

BACK "C"

"A"

"Z"

"B"

"C"

==THROW ==

"Y" + "A"

GAME IS  FREE BUT YOU CAN DONATE FOR ME TO IMPROVE THE GAME. :)

This Game is available both for android and PC.

Android tutorial on my Youtube so you can play in your mobile.
